meanings.definition: A type of neckline on a garment that is wide and shallow, resembling the shape of a boat.
meanings.sent1: She loved the elegant boatneck on her new dress.
meanings.sent2: The boatneck of the sweater showed off her collarbones.
meanings.sent3: The boatneck on the blouse made her feel like a fashionable sailor.
meanings.sent4: Her boatneck top sailed smoothly through the sea of fashion trends.
meanings.sent5: The boatneck framed her face beautifully, drawing attention upward.

meanings.definition: A style of shirt or dress with a boatneck neckline.
meanings.sent1: The boatneck dress she wore was perfect for the summer picnic.
meanings.sent2: She chose a boatneck top to match her casual jeans.
meanings.sent3: The boatneck shirt made her look like she was ready to set sail.
meanings.sent4: In her boatneck dress, she felt as graceful as a swan on water.
meanings.sent5: The boatneck neckline added a touch of sophistication to her outfit.
